test.name: Check if Recon Web UI is up

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Execute
Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.
kw.msg: Running command 'curl --negotiate -u : -v http://recon:9888 2>&1'.

${output} = % Total % Received % Xferd Average Speed Time Time Time Current Dload Upload Total Spent Left Speed
0 0 0 0 0 0 0 ...

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: % Total % Received % Xferd Average Speed Time Time Time Current Dload Upload Total Spent Left Speed 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 --:--:-- --:--:-- --:--:-- 0* About to connect() to recon port 9888 (#0) * Trying 172.23.0.7... * Connected to recon (172.23.0.7) port 9888 (#0) > GET / HTTP/1.1 > User-Agent: curl/7.29.0 > Host: recon:9888 > Accept: */* > < HTTP/1.1 200 OK < Date: Tue, 30 Jun 2020 13:21:51 GMT < Cache-Control: no-cache < Expires: Tue, 30 Jun 2020 13:21:51 GMT < Date: Tue, 30 Jun 2020 13:21:51 GMT < Pragma: no-cache < Content-Type: text/html < X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff < X-FRAME-OPTIONS: SAMEORIGIN < X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block < Expires: Tue, 30 Jun 2020 13:21:51 GMT < Date: Tue, 30 Jun 2020 13:21:51 GMT < Pragma: no-cache < X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff < X-FRAME-OPTIONS: SAMEORIGIN < X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block < Last-Modified: Tue, 30 Jun 2020 12:42:54 GMT < Accept-Ranges: bytes < Content-Length: 2267 < { [data not shown] 100 2267 100 2267 0 0 106k 0 --:--:-- --:--:-- --:--:-- 110k * Connection #0 to host recon left intact Ozone Recon

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.
kw.msg: Argument types are: <class 'int'> <type 'unicode'>

${result} = % Total % Received % Xferd Average Speed Time Time Time Current Dload Upload Total Spent Left Speed
0 0 0 0 0 0 0 ...

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

suite.doc: Smoke test to start cluster with docker-compose environments.
